# Interface: AutoscaleInfo

Represents information used to update a price scale.

## Properties[​](AutoscaleInfo.html#properties "Direct link to Properties"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Properties"} {#properties .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

### priceRange[​](AutoscaleInfo.html#pricerange "Direct link to priceRange"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to priceRange"} {#pricerange .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> **priceRange**: [`PriceRange`](PriceRange.html)

Price range.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### margins?[​](AutoscaleInfo.html#margins "Direct link to margins?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to margins?"} {#margins .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> `optional` **margins**: [`AutoScaleMargins`](AutoScaleMargins.html)

Scale margins.
